metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28287 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In unusual circumstances, selecting text could cause text selection caching to behave incorrectly, leading to a crash. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 99.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-28287` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 1:1snap1-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1snap1-0ubuntu1').
